overview:
Jack Yu is VP of Marketing and Employee #1 at Curebit.

Prior to joining Curebit, Jack was Sr Marketing Manager at Care.com where he ran SEM, retargeting & display advertising channels and championed both its mobile & referrals platforms. His career in direct response began at Adverplex driving traffic to lead generation and click arbitrage sites. Before that, Jack cofounded Gotbrainy.com, a peer-to-peer education site, where he ran social media and grass-roots marketing campaigns. He earned Engineering degrees from MIT in 2001 and UC Berkeley in 2003.
